content: In the popular video game franchise "Super Mario Bros.", what are the names of the two main characters, who happen to be brothers?

In the "Super Mario Bros." video game franchise, the two main characters who are brothers are Mario and Luigi. Mario is the shorter, more adventurous brother, while Luigi is taller and often portrayed as more timid. They are iconic characters in the video game industry, created by Nintendo, and have appeared in numerous games, spin-offs, and adaptations over the years.
